tool_description: This API contains news regarding crypto
name: Crypto-News-API
title: Crypto-News-API

api_list.name: Get Crypto News from particular publication
api_list.description:
Get crypto news from a particular publication.
The publications are:

1. BBC
2. NYTimes
3.  NewsBTC
4. CryptoNewz
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/NYTimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Crypto News
api_list.description: Get crypto news from all the resources
